title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, Parmesan, black pepper
steps: 1. Boil pasta. 2. Fry pancetta. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine.

title: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful curry with chicken and spices
ingredients: Chicken, curry powder, coconut milk, onions, garlic
steps: 1. Fry onions. 2. Add chicken. 3. Add spices and coconut milk.
